subject: How to use the GUI TestRunner
msgSnippet: Hi, I tried to use junit.awtui.TestRunner or junit.swingui.TestRunner but haven t been successful.  The static run() method takes a Class object.  So I tried
messageBody:
Hi, I tried to use junit.awtui.TestRunner or junit.swingui.TestRunner
but haven't been successful. The static run() method takes a Class
object. So I tried my AllTests class which provides:
public static Test suite() {
TestSuite suite = new TestSuite("AllTests");
suite.addTestSuite(MyTest.class);
return suite;
}
But got java.lang.ClassCastException: junit.framework.TestSuite

If I run MyTest instead, I got Failure from the UI:
junit.framework.AssertionFailedError: No tests found in MyTest

How this supposed to work?

Thanks for any help on this!

Bianca
